courses.title: Introduction to Programming
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of programming using Python, suitable for beginners.

courses.title: Data Structures and Algorithms
courses.description: Master data structures and algorithms to enhance your coding skills and problem-solving.

courses.title: Web Development Bootcamp
courses.description: Build modern web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in this comprehensive course.

courses.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
courses.description: Explore the basics of machine learning and artificial intelligence through practical projects.

courses.title: Mobile App Development
courses.description: Create engaging mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms using React Native.

courses.title: Database Management Systems
courses.description: Learn about relational databases, SQL, and data modeling to effectively manage data.

courses.title: Cybersecurity Essentials
courses.description: Understand the principles of cybersecurity and how to protect systems from cyber threats.

courses.title: DevOps Practices
courses.description: Learn the principles of DevOps and how to automate deployment pipelines.

courses.title: Cloud Computing Fundamentals
courses.description: Get introduced to cloud services and learn how to deploy applications in the cloud.

courses.title: Software Engineering Principles
courses.description: Discover the key concepts of software development methodologies and best practices.
